comment.author: Brenna
comment.text: I think that it's a draw between the two as to who is the most dishonest. But if Trump wins then I sure hope you all get more than what you ask for. I'll start building my fallout shelter.

replies.author: Kiera
replies.text: No way. Hillarys history speaks for her. She is far worse. You will need that shelter if she wins. She will just divide this country even more.

replies.author: James
replies.text: Kiera unfortunately, courtney, many americans have been brainwashed by the liberal media... they think trump is bad but dismisses CROOKED hillary's past.
